metadata.name: Google Workspace User Granted Admin Privileges
metadata.comment: Detects when an Google Workspace user is granted admin privileges.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM entity_management WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('3') AND lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('admin.googleapis.com') AND (lower(LOWER(api.operation)) in ('grant_delegated_admin_privileges', 'grant_admin_privilege')))

output.summary: Detects when an Google Workspace user is granted admin privileges.

metadata.objective: False positive: Google Workspace admin role privileges, may be modified by system administrators. References: https://cloud.google.com/logging/docs/audit/gsuite-audit-logging#3, https://developers.google.com/admin-sdk/reports/v1/appendix/activity/admin-user-settings#GRANT_ADMIN_PRIVILEGE
